PAGE.TITLE: Eclipse
PAGE.CONTENT:
Install and update
Set up the Proxy:
go in WindowPreferencesInstall/Update
select Enable HTTP proxy connection
fill HTTP proxy host address: and HTTP proxy host port:.
Install new stuff:
go in HelpSoftware UpdatesFind and Install…
select Search for new features to install and click Next
select the update site(s) and click Finish
select the feature(s) and click Next
select I accept the terms in the license agreement and click Next
check that there is enough free disk space and click Finish
wait for Verification window and click Install All
Launch
For a unknown reason -vmargs -XmxαM does not work if α is greater than 1024.
But the following command line works:
eclipse -vm "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\java.exe" -vmargs -Xmx1600m (but the value 1600 seems to depends on some PC characteristics, which ones?)

Maven
Configure the location of the local repository
Create the directories C:\foobar\maven2 and C:\foobar\maven2\repository.
Create the file C:\foobar\maven2\settings.xml containing <settings xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/SETTINGS/1.0.0"
xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/SETTINGS/1.0.0 https://maven.apache.org/xsd/settings-1.0.0.xsd">
<localRepository>F:\foobar\maven2\repository</localRepository>
</settings>
In WindowPreferencesMavenUser settings, set User Settings to C:\foobar\maven2\settings.xml
